svg.source:
Title : Game flow (machine rocks)
No.of round is 1
Participant failed to select the drawing word within the given time
All Participant failed to provide correct answer within the given time
participant Participant_1 as p1 participant Server as server participant Participant_2 as p2 participant DB as db participant Scheduler as scheduler p1 --> server : connect p2 --> server : connect p1 --> server : create game p2 --> server : join game p1 --> server : start game server -> db : update game records server -> db : assign roles server -> scheduler : schedule task to auto select drawing word (w1) #note right of scheduler : schedule task to
force select the word
after 'x' seconds server -> db : map & persist 'w1' task id with game id server -> p1 : game ready server -> p2 : game ready p1 --> server : get game state p2 --> server : get game state server -> p1 : user role as 'drawer' server -> p2 : user role as 'viewer' p1 --> server : get list of words note left of db : Particpant didn't select any word scheduler -> server : auto select a word (w1 task kicks-in) server -> db : map & persist selected word with game id server -> db : invalidate 'w1' task server -> p1 : start drawing server -> scheduler : schedule task to auto end current drawing session (d1) server -> p2 : hint about the word p2 --> server : answer server -> p2 : wrong answer p2 --> server : answer server -> p2 : wrong answer note left of db :Didn't receive a correct answer from
all participant (d1 task kicks-in) scheduler -> server : end current drawing session server -> db : invalidate 'd1' task server -> p1 : show score board server -> p2 : show score board server -> db : assign roles server -> scheduler : schedule task to auto select drawing word (w2) server -> db : map & persist 'w2' task id with game id server -> p1 : user role as 'viewer' server -> p2 : user role as 'drawer' p2 --> server : get list of words note left of db : Particpant didn't select any word scheduler -> server : auto select a word (w2 task kicks-in)
server -> db : map & persist selected word with game id server -> db : invalidate 'w2' task server -> p2 : start drawing server -> scheduler : schedule task to auto end current drawing session (d2) server -> p1 : hint about the word p1 --> server : answer server -> p1 : wrong answer note left of db :Didn't receive a correct answer from
all participant (d2 task kicks-in) scheduler -> server : end current drawing session server -> db : invalidate 'd2' task server -> p1 : show final score board server -> p2 : show final score board
svg.desc: Game flow (machine rocks) No.of round is 1 Participant failed to select the drawing word within the given time All Participant failed to provide correct answer within the given time

text.tspan: Participant failed to select the drawing word within the given time
All Participant failed to provide correct answer within the given time
schedule task to auto select drawing word (w1)
map & persist 'w1' task id with game id
auto select a word (w1 task kicks-in)
map & persist selected word with game id
schedule task to auto end current drawing session (d1)
Didn't receive a correct answer from
schedule task to auto select drawing word (w2)
map & persist 'w2' task id with game id
auto select a word (w2 task kicks-in)
map & persist selected word with game id
schedule task to auto end current drawing session (d2)
Didn't receive a correct answer from
